title: What Fonts Are Used on This Website?
content: I am wondering what fonts are used on this website. Im thinking for normal text its Georgia but for the rest I am not so sure. If anyone can help out that would be great :D
author: HopelessTypeStudent

comments.content:
Hi Devin,

the top menu is Gotham, everything else is Georgia & Verdana.  
The headline is rendered in the [Featured Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20100212132912/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Featured%2520Face) – at the moment, that’s Elli.  
F
Thanks, just what I was looking for :)
